detail_desc: Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Earmuffs in padded, soft faux fur with an adjustable plastic headband covered in fleece.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Tube scarf and double-layered hat in soft jersey.
Wide, off-the-shoulder top in a patterned viscose weave with a frill trim and elastication around the top and short trumpet sleeves.
Derby shoes in imitation leather with lacing at the front and a welt seam around the soles. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.

Set in soft cotton. Two tops in sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud at the back of one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Two long-sleeved tops and a T-shirt in jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Two pairs of joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. One pair of joggers in jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Short dress in a viscose weave with lace trims, short sleeves and a V-neck opening at the top with twisted ties. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Hoop earrings in metal and plastic with a globe-shaped pendant. Length approx. 3.5 cm.

V-neck, knee-length shirt dress in a softly draping silk and viscose weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front. Tapered waist with pleats front and back and a sewn-in tie belt. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft knit with a longer, rounded layer in woven fabric at the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Sunglasses with metal frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim in a slightly looser fit. Regular waist, zip fly and button, slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with raw-edge hems.
Metal earrings in the shape of stars covered in sparkly stones. Length 3 cm.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed cotton denim with a high waist and zip fly and button.

Fully lined swimsuit with a deep, flounce-trimmed, elasticated V-neck front and back. Cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and decorative crossover lacing at the front. High-cut legs and medium coverage at the back.

Jacket in woven fabric with a small print motif at the top. Detachable, jersey-lined hood, a stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Lined.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with a high collar and long sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs.
Oversized top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood,  kangaroo pocket, dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Ankle-length jeans in washed stretch twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and skinny legs with stripes down the sides.
Fully lined bikini. Top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, two rows of flounces, a small metal decoration at the front and a plastic fastener at the back. Matching bikini bottoms.
Short, V-neck dress in jersey with narrow, tie-top shoulder straps and gathered seams at the waist and hips for added width and soft draping. Unlined.
Metal ear cuffs in various designs.

Blouse in woven fabric with a sweetheart neckline and long puff sleeves that are elasticated at the top and have a covered button at the cuffs. Gathered elastication at the front and down the sides and a smocked section at the back. Unlined.
Straight-cut top in jersey crêpe with long dolman sleeves and a low-cut back with crossover straps.
Thin metal curb chain bracelet with a trigger clasp.
Felted wool beret.
Wide cropped top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and raw edges at the cuffs and hem.

Calf-length kaftan dress in a soft viscose weave with a V-neck and concealed buttons down the front. Gently tapered waist with pleats front and back and a detachable tie belt, and short, wide sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Unlined.

Blouse in a viscose weave with a V-neck, covered buttons at the top, gathers at the shoulders and a gathered yoke at the back. Elasticated seam under the bust and long sleeves with a covered button at the cuffs.
3/4-length leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Shopper in a cotton jacquard weave with two handles at the top, decorative tassels and two inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Size 12x30x40 cm.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with 3/4-length sleeves with drawstrings at the cuffs, and gathers in the sides for best fit.
Long metal earrings. Length 7 cm.

prod_name: So Fresh and So Clean Top
detail_desc: Fully lined bikini top with a high-cut front, wide shoulder straps, a plastic fastener at the back and an elasticated hem.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Trenchcoat in soft Tencel™ lyocell twill with a loose yoke front and back, pockets in the side seams, a detachable tie belt at the waist and a single back vent. Unlined.
Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details, a padded top edge, wide elastic at the front and a loop front and back. Mesh linings and insoles and EVA (ethylene-vinyl acetate) and rubber soles.
Top in a soft, fine knit with lace shoulder sections and short lace sleeves with scalloped trims.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a contrasting colour ribbed trim around the neckline and sleeves.
Short-sleeved dress in patterned jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Wide, straight-cut blouse in woven fabric with covered buttons at the front. Small stand-up collar, an opening and buttons at the back of the neck and short puff sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs.
Fitted T-shirt in wool jersey with flatlock seams at the front, a ribbed neckline and a rounded hem.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Trainers in mesh with lacing at the front and grosgrain loops front and back. Mesh linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Soft jersey leggings in a cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with short sleeves and a slightly deeper, lace-trimmed neckline.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey, one with a print motif.
Shorter-style top in an airy rib knit. Deep wide neckline with an opening and ties at the front, long raglan sleeves and frill-trimmed smocking at the cuffs and hem.
Belt in imitation suede with movable metal details and a metal buckle. Width 2.5 cm.
Slingbacks with pointed toes, shiny heels and an ankle strap that is elasticated at the back. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and smooth soles. Heel 6 cm.
Padded jacket in nylon with a detachable hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with high shafts and elasticated tops.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapering legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Fully-fashioned trainers with elastication around the opening, lacing at the front and a loop with a rubber print at the back. Mesh insoles, and EVA (ethylene-vinyl acetate) and rubber soles.
Long-sleeved piqué top in fine-knit merino wool with a ribbed collar, button placket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a text motif, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline and a drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Belt in grained imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width approx. 2.2 cm.
Straight-style vest top in soft jersey with a round neckline and visible seam down the back.

Tailored trousers in woven fabric made from a wool blend with a high waist and fly with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening. Diagonal side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave made from a cotton blend with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Hat in a soft, textured-knit wool blend with fleece lining.
Top in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and picot trims at the top.
Trainers with mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with full feet and wide, foldover ribbing at the waist.
Long dress in heavily draping jersey with a sheen. One narrow shoulder strap, elastication at the top to hold the dress in place, asymmetric seams and a high slit in one side. Lined at the top.

Long, flared dress in an airy weave with a double-layered, stand-up collar, long ties at the back of the neck and an opening at the back. Voluminous, elbow-length sleeves, and seams at the waist and hips for added width. V-neck underdress in woven fabric with adjustable shoulder straps. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Shawl collar, concealed pockets in the side seams, 3/4-length sleeves with gathers at the cuffs, and a tie belt at the waist. No fasteners. Lined.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.

Set with a hooded top and joggers in printed sweatshirt fabric. Top with a jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Trousers in stretch jersey with an elasticated waist and fake fly with a button. Side pockets and a fake welt back pocket with a button.
Playsuit in a softly draping viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.
Pull-on trousers in an airy weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and a back pocket.
Wide off-the-shoulder blouse in woven fabric with elastication at the back and short balloon sleeves in a double layer with narrow, concealed elastic at the cuffs.

Fully lined cargo trousers in soft, washed cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Flap front and leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening, fake back pockets with a decorative sewn-on flap, and shaped, tapered legs. Jersey lining.
Lace bra with underwired, lightly padded cups that lift and shape the bust and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
